normalAttackSkill.name: ​Judgment Cut​
normalAttackSkill.desc:
Blade Intent
Stacks 2 Blade Intent per second. When fully charged, Special Attack is enhanced: Consumes 100 Blade Intent to greatly increase its casting speed.

Basic Attack: Swift Justice
Unleashes up to four sweeping strikes in scythe form, each dealing Attack Damage.

Tips: Time your Special Attack right after maxing out Blade Intent for maximum DMG.

specialSkill.name: ​Iaido Slash​
specialSkill.desc:
After charging, delivers a swift forward slash that consumes all Thunder Sigils to deal Attack Damage. Each Thunder Sigil consumed boosts DMG by 25%.
"Everything I see, hear, or sense—can be severed."

Tips: For maximum DMG, use when Thunder Sigil count reaches its limit.

ultimateSkill.name: Oblivion Combo
ultimateSkill.desc:
A supreme sword technique sharp enough to cut the air itself. Unleashes a flurry of slashes in front, dealing Attack Damage to all enemies in range. Grants max Thunder Sigil at the end of the strike.
"Heaven's weapon dims even the brightest stars."

Tips: Use when Thunder Sigil is empty to quickly charge it. Also effective against multiple targets for massive area damage.

normalSkills.name: ​Overdrive​
normalSkills.desc:
Unleashes the power of the tachi, each strike transforms the blade into a scythe, dealing higher Attack Damage and granting 1 Thunder Sigil.
This skill has 5 Overdrives.

Tips: Ensure Thunder Sigil does not overflow—keep at least one Charge regenerating for consistent recharge.

normalSkills.name: Flash strike
normalSkills.desc:
Consume all Thunder Sigils, charges forward after powering up to slash all enemies, dealing Attack Damage. Each Thunder Sigil increases DMG by 25%.
"Between lightning flashes, the blade leaves its sheath."

Tips: A cornerstone skill of the Thunderlash Spec Source. Use before Iaido Slash when possible. For maximum DMG, activate when Thunder Sigil count reaches its limit.

normalSkills.name: Raijin Dash
normalSkills.desc:
Consume all Thunder Sigils to release slashes across a wide area, dealing Attack Damage. Each Thunder Sigil increases DMG by 25%. Grants immunity to all DMG while slashing.

Tips: Core skill of the Spec. For highest DMG, release when facing 3 or more targets with maximum Thunder Sigil count.

normalSkills.name: Scythe Wheel
normalSkills.desc:
Change weapon to a scythe, swinging it to perform multi-hit attacks against surrounding enemies, dealing Attack Damage and reple enemies. The final strike inflicts a 50% Wound on the target for 10s.
Summon Moonblade to aid in combat.

Moonblade: Spin for 35s, dealing Attack Damage on the target every 2s. Casting Moonstrike commands all active Moonblades to release a whirlwind attack, dealing Attack Damage to nearby enemies.

Tips: Core skill to the Spec, release just prior to each Moonblade's expiration to maximize DMG.

normalSkills.name: ​Thundercut​
normalSkills.desc:
A lightning-fast Iai Slash, inflic Attack Damage on enemies at the cost of 50 Blade Intent. If Blade Intent remains after the strike, the skill can be recast.

Tips: Core skill of the Spec, consumes Blade Intent to deal DMG. Release when Blade Intent has reached its maximum capacity.

normalSkills.name: Volt Surge
normalSkills.desc:
Enchants the blade with thunderous power. While active, any action that would grant Thunder Sigils instead instantly maxes out Thunder Sigils. Also increases Attack Power for the duration.

Tips: Best paired with Overdrive and Talents to rapidly gain and spend Thunder Sigils, unleashing massive DMG within a short window.

normalSkills.name: ​Stormflash​
normalSkills.desc:
Unleashes raging Thunder within, generating 20 Blade Intent every 1s. During this state, using Expertise that consume Blade Intent triggers a Lightning Strike, dealing Attack Damage to the current target.

Tips: Pair with Thundercut to generate more Thunder strikes. Higher Mastery significantly increases Moonstrike DMG when using the Moonstrike Spec.

normalSkills.name: ​True Sight​
normalSkills.desc:
Enter a defensive stance, gaining immunity to all DMG. If hit while in stance, counter with a slash and leaps backward. Recast to dash forward and slashes, dealing Attack Damage. If the attack hits a target, gain max Thunder Sigil.

Tips: Release under intense battles or when confident in timing to gain Thunder Sigil more efficiently.

talentSkills.name: Moonstrike
talentSkills.desc:
Consumes 3 Thunder Sigils to dash forward with a spinning blade attack, dealing Attack Damage to nearby enemies. Moonstrike simultaneously performs a circular slashing attack, dealing Attack Damage to surrounding targets. This DMG grows stronger with Scythe Wheel skill upgrades and advancements.
"Under the moonlight, I move as one with the shadows."

Tips: For maximum effectiveness, use when multiple Moonstrikes exist to trigger additional whirling attacks.

talentSkills.name: Oblivion Combo
talentSkills.desc:
Oblivion Combo
A supreme sword technique sharp enough to cut the air itself. Unleashes a flurry of slashes in front, dealing Attack Damage to all enemies in range. Grants max Thunder Sigil at the end of the strike.
"Heaven's weapon dims even the brightest stars."

Tips: Use when Thunder Sigil is empty to quickly charge it. Also effective against multiple targets for massive area damage.

normalAttackSkill.name: Raincall Surge
normalAttackSkill.desc:
Ice Energy
A key resource for unleashing Special Attacks and Expertise. Starts with a maximum of 50 points, automatically restoring 2 points per second.

Basic Attack: Raincall Surge
Unleashes up to four consecutive water-based attacks, each dealing Magic Damage.

Tips: When Ice Energy is low, this skill allows you to deal DMG flexibly as needed.

specialSkill.name: Frost Lance
specialSkill.desc:
Channels for 1.4s, then consumes 10 Ice Energy to fire a sharp Frost Lance at the target, dealing Magic Damage on impact.
Allows the consumption of 1 Frost Crystal to skip channeling and to increase DMG by 20%.

Tips: Use Frost Lance regularly to avoid wasting excess ERG.

ultimateSkill.name: ​Glacier Hymn​
ultimateSkill.desc:
Summon the ice's blessing to unfold an Ice Domain, knocking all enemies back within the range. Then summons a comet to strike the targets, dealing Magic Damage and inflicting Freeze on all affected enemies.
Ice Domain
Within the Domain, restores 220 Ice Energy over time and gains Ultra Cold. Enemies within the domain are continuously Slowed, escalating to Freeze.
While in Ultra Cold, targets are treated as Freeze.

Tips: Casting should be avoided when Ice Energy approaches its maximum capacity, otherwise Ice Energy will be promptly expended. The skill enhanced by Ultra Cold achieve optimal effectiveness when used within its range.

normalSkills.name: Meteor Storm
normalSkills.desc:
Consumes 5 Ice Energy to instantly summon 3 Meteor Storms above the target, dealing Magic Damage to the target and surrounding enemies.
This skill holds 2 charges.

Tips: This instant-cast DMG skill is best utilized during mobile combat to maximize DMG dealt through repeated use.

normalSkills.name: Crystal Veil
normalSkills.desc:
Casts a slow-moving aqueous orb and gains 1 Frost Crystal immediately, and 1 Frost Crystal every 3s thereafter. On impact, the orb's velocity decays. While the aqueous orb persists, it continuously deals Magic Damage to all nearby enemies and applies Frost to them.

Ultra Cold Crystal Veil
While in the Ultra Cold, the aqueous orb will freeze and violently explode upon ending, dealing higher Magic Damage to all enemies within range.

This skill holds 2 charges.

Tips: At least 1 charge is maintained at all times, unless Ice Energy exceeds its maximum capacity. It is recommended to maintain two charges before casting the Ultimate, as combining it with Ultra Cold grants bonus DMG.

tags.name: Expertise Skill
tags.desc: Skills and moves that can be freely combined and replaced with the weapon

tags.name: Magic
tags.desc: Damage is magic, not affected by Block

tags.name: Ice
tags.desc: Skill carries the power of the Ice

tags.name: DOT
tags.desc: Skills that affect the target or leave a DMG area that persists for a period, causing continuous DMG that cannot trigger Luck effects (this type of healing cannot trigger Luck effect)

tags.name: AoE
tags.desc: Triggers a stronger effect when there are many targets (if it causes DMG, the DMG to all targets diminishes simultaneously)

tags.name: Slow
tags.desc: In a state of reduced Speed

tags.name: Ranged
tags.desc: The skill remains effective even at a longer distance from the target

normalSkills.name: Blizzard
normalSkills.desc:
Channels for 2.9s, then consumes 20 Ice Energy to summon an intense Blizzard at the target location, continuously dealing Magic Damage and applying Frost to all enemies within the area.

Tips: This devastating AoE skill is most effective when used against immobilized enemies to maximize DMG dealt.

normalSkills.name: ​Maelstrom​
normalSkills.desc:
Unleashes a water vortex at the target's feet, continuously dealing Magic Damage to enemies within range. Each time DMG is dealt, for every 1 target hit, restore 2 Ice Energy. A maximum of 10 Ice Energy can be restored per hit.

Ultra Cold Vortex
While in the Ultra Cold state, the water vortex will freeze and violently explode upon ending, dealing higher Magic Damage to all enemies within range.

Tips: Pair with Ray Stream. Casting at the right moment can restore considerable Ice Energy.

normalSkills.name: Frozen Gale
normalSkills.desc:
Unleashes built-up cold energy in a violent surge, dealing Magic Damage and inflicting Frozen on nearby enemies.
Charging the skill alters both its range and DMG.
Tier 1: Chants for 1 sec, targeting a 8m frontal cone.
Tier 2: Chants for 2 secs, targeting a 8m frontal cone with 50% increased DMG.
Tier 3: Chants for 3 secs, targeting a 8m frontal cone with 100% increased DMG.
When holding 1 / 3 / 5 Frozen, the skill will instantly cast at Tier 1 / 2 / 3, skipping the charge time.

Tips: This skill offers both area damage and crowd control. For best results, cast it when you have high Frost Crystal count.

normalSkills.name: Permafrost
normalSkills.desc:
Summon the Strength of Nei to generate 6 Ice Energy per second and increase Haste for the duration.

Tips: Increases Attack Power and casting speed. Since this skill generates Ice Energy, avoid using it when Ice Energy is near maximum, or quickly spend Ice Energy afterward.

normalSkills.name: Tidepool
normalSkills.desc:
Summon a surging Tidal Vortex at the target location, dealing Magic Damage on impact. Channels for 5s after casting. Can be manually canceled by casting again.

Ultra Cold: Tidepool
During the Ultra Cold state, the vortex Frozens upon ending and explodes, dealing higher Magic Damage to all enemies within range.

Tips: You cannot move or cast other skills while channeling. Best paired with allies' AoE skills in team play.

tags.name: Expertise Skill
tags.desc: Skills and moves that can be freely combined and replaced with the weapon

tags.name: Magic
tags.desc: Damage is magic, not affected by Block

tags.name: Ice
tags.desc: Skill carries the power of the Ice

tags.name: DOT
tags.desc: Skills that affect the target or leave a DMG area that persists for a period, causing continuous DMG that cannot trigger Luck effects (this type of healing cannot trigger Luck effect)

tags.name: AoE
tags.desc: Triggers a stronger effect when there are many targets (if it causes DMG, the DMG to all targets diminishes simultaneously)

tags.name: Channelling
tags.desc: A skill release method that requires maintaining a casting state to continue the effect

tags.name: Ranged
tags.desc: The skill remains effective even at a longer distance from the target

normalSkills.name: Frost Shelter
normalSkills.desc:
When the caster is encased in ice, they become immune to all DMG but are unable to move for the duration. Deals Magic Damage to all nearby enemies, and inflicts Slow, which upgrades to Freeze.

Tips: This item is intended to be equipped in high-pressure situations to increase survivability.

talentSkills.name: ​Frostbeam​
talentSkills.desc:
Consumes 15 Ice Energy to launch a concentrated ice beam toward the target, dealing Magic Damage to all enemies in its path every 0.3s. After dealing DMG 5 instances, the beam attempts to consume additional Ice Energy to sustain itself. Every 12 Ice Energy extends the beam by 0.3s and deals 1 additional instance of DMG. Each time Frostbeam deals DMG, it increases its own DMG by 8%, up to 80%. (Beam terminates when Ice Energy drops below 3.)
Frostbeam's firing interval is affected by Haste.

Tips: Use when Ice Energy is near maximum capacity for extended beam duration. While firing, use the joystick to make minor positioning adjustments.

Leaps and slams twin axes downward, striking enemies along the path and dealing Fire DMG upon impact.
Heavy Strike: Blazing Shockwave
Holds to charge, then swings forward with full force, dealing Fire DMG.

Pro Tips: Good filler when main skills are on Cooldown .

ultimateSkill.name: Fire Demon
ultimateSkill.desc:
Fire Demon:·Ember-End Slash
Enters the Scorching Flame state and unleashes a devastating slam to enemies along your path, dealingFire DMG.
While in Scorching Flame, Flame Energy drains over time and also decreases with every Secondary and Main skill used. Once the gauge is depleted, the state ends.
"Burn—let the embers consume everything."

Pro Tips: Main Attack skill. While in Ultimate, all other skills are enhanced. Faster Attack Power SPD means more hits and more consistent Ignite.

normalAttackSkill.name: Windborne Grace
normalAttackSkill.desc:
Courage
A vital resource needed to perform Special Attacks and select Expertise Skills. Automatically recovers at 3 points per second, with a starting maximum of 100 points.

Basic Attack: Windborne Grace
Executes a sequence of up to four attacks, dealing Attack Damage

Tips: Fall back on Basic Attacks when Courage is too low to use other offensive abilities.

specialSkill.name: Gale Thrust
specialSkill.desc:
Consumes 50 Courage to perform 3 thrusts toward the enemy, dealing Attack Damage with each hit.

Tips: Time casts carefully, using this skill between Basic Attacks, as Courage takes time to stack.

ultimateSkill.name: Typhoon Cleave
ultimateSkill.desc:
Launches into enemy lines, dealing Attack Damage to enemies in range and knocking them Airborne. Restores 100 Courage.
"Endless storm, unlock thy mighty power at my knight's command! Wind, reveal thy glory with a surging rush!"

Tips: Use when Courage is low.

normalSkills.name: ​Galeform​
normalSkills.desc:
Stuns enemies in front upon casting, dealing Attack Damage. While active, continuously restores 105 Courage and increases your Strength.
This skill has 2 Overdrives.

Tips: Use when Courage is low.

normalSkills.name: Spiral Thrust
normalSkills.desc:
Consumes 30 Courage to reel in the spinning lance and unleash a final piercing strike. The spiraling gust tears through the air, dealing sustained Attack Damage to enemies in range. The initial strike inflicts a 50% Wound on the target, lasting 10s.

Tips: When sufficient Courage is available, priority should be given to the casting of this highest-priority skill.

normalSkills.name: Breach Pursuit
normalSkills.desc:
Lunges toward the enemy, dealing Attack Damage and gaining 15 Courage. Can be cast again to unleash a sweeping slash, dealing Attack Damage to all nearby enemies and knocking them Airborne. Targets with Resilience cannot be knocked airborne but will have their Resilience reduced. Additionally, gains 10 Courage for each enemy hit, up to a maximum of 50 Courage.

Tips: Equip when facing multiple enemies.

tags.desc: Damage generated by the skill move itself

tags.desc: Triggers a stronger effect when there are many targets (if it causes DMG, the DMG to all targets diminishes simultaneously)

tags.desc: The skill only affects targets within close range

normalSkills.name: Falcon Toss
normalSkills.desc:
Consumes 40 Courage to leap into the air and hurl a wind-forged spear with force. Deals Attack Damage to all enemies in range and greatly reduces their Resilience. Grants 1 stack of Sharp.

Tips: Effective against enemies with Resilience. Also recommended when dealing with multiple targets.

Tips: Use with Skyward Spec. Cast when Courage is low to avoid wasting regen.

normalSkills.name: Valor Cyclone
normalSkills.desc:
Converts Courage into a sustained wind field, dealing Attack Damage to nearby enemies until Courage runs out, using 16 Courage per second. The skill may be deactivated by clicking again.

Tips: Cast at full Courage and regain Courage during Valor Cyclone to extend duration.

normalSkills.name: Sharp Impact
normalSkills.desc:
Leaps into the air and crashes down, dealing massive Attack Damage to the target and surrounding enemies. For every 1 stack of Sharp consumed, this skill gains 5% Overdrive.

Tips: Sharp Impact deals massive DMG. Aim to consume as much Sharp as possible within a fixed time window to maximize DMG.

normalSkills.name: ​Aegis Gale​
normalSkills.desc:
"Wind pressure is condensed in front of the user, rendering them immune to all DMG. Counterattack DMG is incrementally amplified with each incoming attack, dealing Attack Damage in retaliation.

Tips: This item is intended to be used in high-pressure situations to increase survivability. Significantly higher returns are granted in response to high-frequency enemy attacks."

talentSkills.name: Typhoon Cleave
talentSkills.desc:
Launches into enemy lines, dealing Attack Damage to enemies in range and knocking them Airborne. Restores 100 Courage.
"Endless storm, unlock thy mighty power at my knight's command! Wind, reveal thy glory with a surging rush!"

Tips: Use when Courage is low.

tags.name: Ultimate
tags.desc: The ultimate combat arcane of the most powerful weapon

tags.name: Physical
tags.desc: Damage is physical, affected by Block

tags.name: Wind
tags.desc: Skills imbued with the power of the Wind

tags.name: Direct DMG
tags.desc: Damage generated by the skill move itself

tags.name: AoE
tags.desc: Triggers a stronger effect when there are many targets (if it causes DMG, the DMG to all targets diminishes simultaneously)

tags.name: Melee
tags.desc: The skill only affects targets within close range

talentSkills.name: Typhoon Cleave
talentSkills.desc:
Raise the banner spear, applying Inspire to Allies. Afterward, a follow-up leap can be launched, dealing Attack Damage to the enemies within range and knocking them airborne, while restoring 100 Courage.
Inspire: Lasts for 10s. During this time, all Allies' Haste +10%. You restore 10 Courage per second and 1 stack of Sharpness every 2s.
"Endless storm, unlock thy mighty power at my knight's command! Wind, reveal thy glory with a surging rush! Manifest in the wind!

Tips: Casting is advised when Courage is low.

talentSkills.name: Swift Blade
talentSkills.desc:
Deals Attack Damage equal to 100% Attack Power to all the enemies, which scales with the Level/Tier of Basic Attack.
Restores 10 Courage immediately upon use.

talentSkills.name: Skyfall
talentSkills.desc:
Consumes 35 Courage to leap into the air and deliver a downward strike on the enemy, dealing Attack Damage.
"Even if enemy lines are unbreakable, the wind of victory will tear them asunder!"

Tips: Use when Courage is near cap. When casting in succession, the leap is skipped for faster follow-up attacks.

talentSkills.desc:
Enhanced ​Falcon Toss​, leap into the air and gather wind power, launching a fierce wind blade spear. Deals 750% Attack Power as Attack Damage to all enemies in the area and significantly reduces their tenacity, growing with the upgrade/advancement of the ​Falcon Toss​ skill.
Immediately gain 3 stacks of Sharp after Casting .

Restores 20 Courage immediately upon use.

normalAttackSkill.name: Vines' Embrace
normalAttackSkill.desc:
Energy
A vital resource needed to perform Special Attacks and select Expertise. Regerates 4 points per second, with a starting maximum of 100 points.

Basic Attack: Vine's Grip
Executes a sequence of up to four attacks, dealing Magic Damage.

Tips: Fall back on Basic Attacks when Energy is too low to use other offensive abilities.

specialSkill.name: ​Wild Bloom​
specialSkill.desc:
Consumes 20 Energy to summon a giant vine that strikes a target area, dealing Magic Damage and healing the caster and the nearby ally with the lowest HP (ally prioritized). Healing grows with Magic Power.

Use on demand in emergencies. For better results, pair with offensive skills to trigger Symbiotic Marks and boost effectiveness.

ultimateSkill.name: ​Divine Circle Bloom
ultimateSkill.desc:
Creates a barrier using the forest power. When the barrier forms, it continuously deals Magic Damage to nearby enemies. The caster and up to 10 nearby allies (allies prioritized) receive 25% Defense and HOT while inside the barrier.

Tips: Great for easing pressure on the team. Cast before incoming DMG. Requires solid timing awareness.

normalSkills.name: ​Feral Seed​
normalSkills.desc:
Summon a seed to strike enemies, dealing Magic Damage and reducing their Move SPD by 30%. While dealing DMG, the seed restores a total of 30 ERG.
This skill holds 2 charges.

Tips: Casting is advised when ERG is low.

normalSkills.name: Infusion
normalSkills.desc:

Tips: Great for solo play or filling DMG gaps.

tags.name: Direct DMG
tags.desc: Damage generated by the skill move itself

tags.name: Channelling
tags.desc: A skill release method that requires maintaining a casting state to continue the effect

tags.name: Ranged
tags.desc: The skill remains effective even at a longer distance from the target

normalSkills.name: ​Nourish​
normalSkills.desc:
Consumes 20 Energy to imbue the caster and up to 10 nearby allies (allies prioritized) with the forest power for 10s, healing them every second.

Tips: Use after combat begins to provide steady team-wide healing over time.

normalSkills.name: Regen Pulse
normalSkills.desc:
Chants for 2.3s, then consumes 40 ERG to release a pulse from you. The pulse heals the caster and all affected allies, while also dispelling negative effects.

Tips: Optimal usage is in situations requiring dispels, with careful timing recommended to avoid premature CD expenditure.

tags.desc: Triggers a stronger effect when there are many targets (if it causes DMG, the DMG to all targets diminishes simultaneously)

tags.desc: A skill release method that requires maintaining a casting state to continue the effect

normalSkills.name: ​Nature Ward​
normalSkills.desc:
Grant a Nature Shield to the caster and up to 10 nearby allies (allies prioritized).

Tips: Great for high-pressure moments, helping stabilize the team. Pairs well with Smite Spec Talents for healing allies.

normalSkills.name: ​Blossom Charge
normalSkills.desc:
Blooming Infusion
Unleashes vines, inflicting Stun on surrounding enemies while dealing Magic Damage, and restoring HP to friendly targets around you.

Tips: This is an instant cast skill. Paired with Lifebind Spec talents, it provides good damaging and healing capabilities in combats requiring continuous movement.

normalSkills.name: ​Growth Arcane​
normalSkills.desc:
Applies an acceleration effect to the caster. Increases Magic Power and reduces Cooldown while active.

Tips: Use it when other skills are on Cooldown .

talentSkills.name: ​Life Bloom​
talentSkills.desc:
Chants for 1.8s, then consumes 30 Energy to heal the caster and up to 10 nearby allies (allies are prioritized). Healing grows with Magic Power.

Tips: In emergencies, cast repeatedly for fast healing. Otherwise, use Basic Attacks to stack Regen Buds, boosting Bloom's healing.

talentSkills.name: Stag Charge
talentSkills.desc: Deals <style="magic">Magic Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">200%</style> Attack Power to enemies in the path, and restores HP equal to <style="accent-gn">100%</style> Attack Power to allies in the path (which scales with the Level/Tier of <style="accent-gn">Special Attack</style>).

talentSkills.name: ​Bloomheal​
talentSkills.desc: During the <style="accent-gn">6s</style> channeling, summon <linktext=1529><style="ItemQuality_5">Feral Seed</style></linktext> every 0.5s to deal <style="magic">Magic Damage</style> to surrounding enemies, while healing up to <style="accent-gn">10</style> allies (Allies first) and granting them <style="accent-gn">25%</style> DMG Reduction.

talentSkills.name: ​Vital Surge​
talentSkills.desc: Immediately resets the cooldown of Healing <style="accent-gn">Expertise Skill</style>s and grants <style="accent-gn">50</style> <style="accent-gn">ERG</style>. While active, surrounds you with verdant energy, increasing Attack Power, reducing skill <style="accent-gn">ERG</style> costs, and each <linktext=1527><style="ItemQuality_5">Life Bloom</style></linktext> cast shortens the remaining CD of Healing <style="accent-gn">Expertise Skill</style>s.

talentSkills.name: ​Wild Bloom​
talentSkills.desc:
Consumes 30 Energy to summon giant vines that strike a target area, dealing Magic Damage and healing the caster and the nearby ally with the lowest HP (ally prioritized). Healing grows with Magic Power.

Tips: In emergencies, cast repeatedly for fast healing. Otherwise, use Basic Attacks to stack Regen Buds, which improves both healing and DMG.

normalAttackSkill.name: Thunderclap Arcane
normalAttackSkill.desc:
Basic Attack:·Thunderclap Arcane
Performs up to three consecutive thunder-infused strikes, each dealing Thunder Element damage.
Plunge Attack:·Thunderfall from the Heavens
Charges lightning energy into the gauntlet mid-air, then dives down to impact the ground, dealing Thunder Element damageon landing.
Heavy Strike: Thunder Onslaught
Gathers energy to unleash a powerful cannon blast. During the charge, consumes heat gauge to continuously stack Thunder Onslaught, which increases DMG and range. Releasing the skill or completing the charge unleashes a wide fan-shaped Lightning area damage.
Thunderclap
Increases the next Thunder Onslaught's DMG and AoE range, stacking up to 3 times.

Pro Tips: When monsters are close, hold down Basic Attack to more efficiently knock them back.

specialSkill.name: Thunder Zone
specialSkill.desc:
Thunder Zone
launches into the air and fires a Thunder Bomb at the target. On hit, it deals Thunder DMG and creates a Thunderfield lasting 7s.
Thunderfield
deals AoE Thunder DMG every second to all enemies within the range, with a Slow debuff.

Pro Tips: This skill can be cast while airborne, granting enhanced mobility during execution.

ultimateSkill.name: Thunderburst Oblivion
ultimateSkill.desc:
Thunderburst Oblivion
Launches an Oblivion Bomb that detonates after a short flight or on impact, unleashing a destructive burst of Lightning area damage. Immediately maxes out the weapon's heat gauge upon cast.

Pro Tips: Cast from a safe distance to unlock a brief window of massive Attack.

normalSkills.name: Thunder Traverse
normalSkills.desc:
Thunder Traverse
Unleashes a relentless stream of homing thunder orbs that track enemies and deal Thunder Element damage on impact. Hold the skill button to continue the barrage, consuming the heat gauge to extend its duration.

Pro Tips: Best used when fully charged—hold the skill to unleash an overwhelming barrage for dealing massive DMG.

normalAttackSkill.name: Halberd's Edge
normalAttackSkill.desc:
Rage
An initial cap of 100 points is assigned to this resource, which serves as the essential component for the execution of Special Attacks and Expertise. Restores 2 Rage upon taking DMG, subject to a maximum0.5s CD.

Basic Attack: Halberd's Edge
A heavy four-strike combo with a wide-blade Guardblade, each strike dealing Attack Damage and generating 5 Rage.

Tips: Rage should be accumulated through the use of Basic Attacks.s

specialSkill.name: Shield Bash
specialSkill.desc:
Consumes 40 Rage to unleash a powerful shockwave that dealsAttack Damage to all nearby enemies. When sufficient Sand Crystal is available, it is consumed to generate a Shield that absorbs all incoming DMG, lasting for 12s. For each additional Sand Crystal consumed, additional shield value is added, with a maximum of 2 Sand Crystals consumed at a time. (Shields can stack, but cannot exceed 100% of Max HP.)

Tips: Casting is recommended when no shield is active to ensure continuous shield uptime.

ultimateSkill.name: Cracking Echo
ultimateSkill.desc:
Tectonic Ring
Unleashes the force of Earth, deals massive Attack Damage to a large area in front, inflicts stun on the targets for 3s, and taunts the enemies within range. Then gathers power to instantly obtain 5 Sand Crystals, and to enter Earth Guard mode.
Earh Guard
lasts 8s and grants Super Armor, which increases your Armor by 100%, Max HP by 50%, and generates 40 Rage over time.

Tips: Casting is recommended during instances of significant incoming DMG while tanking.

normalSkills.name: Star Shatter
normalSkills.desc:
Charges ahead with immense force. Upon hit, gains 25 Rage and 1 Sand Crystal, dealsAttack Damage, and stuns the enemy. The unstoppable state is entered during the execution of the charge.
This skill holds 2 overdrives.

Tips: Enhances mobility and effectively accumulates Rage.

normalSkills.name: Sandshroud
normalSkills.desc:
Gathers sand around yourself, dealing a burst of Attack Damage to surrounding enemies. The sand then solidifies, dealing Attack Damage to surrounding enemies every 1 second for 6s. Throughout this effect, continuously regenerates Rage and Sand Crystal, providing 33 Rage and 6 Sand Crystal.

Tips: Activate whenever the CD resets during combat. The continuous AoE DMG maintains high Threat levels while effectively generating Rage.

normalSkills.name: ​Stoneform​
normalSkills.desc:
Channel Earth Strength to taunt nearby enemies while automatically counterattacking High-threat Skill for 10s. Also increases Armor and reduces DMG taken by 20%.

Tips: Cast promptly during high-pressure combat to enhance survivability.

normalSkills.name: Sandgrip
normalSkills.desc:
Consumes 30 Rage to swing the weapon, resulting in the creation of a vacuum. Enemies are pulled in and subjected to Attack Damage, their actions disrupted, and their movement slowed by 70% for 8s.

Tips: Effectively pulls monsters into range for swift elimination.

normalSkills.name: ​Granite Fury​
normalSkills.desc:
Consumes 3 Sand Crystals, dealing Attack Damage to the target and reducing DMG taken by 10% for the next 10s (non-stackable).

Tips: When you have enough Sand Crystals, timely casting of Granite Fury delivers high DMG and ensures stable survival.

normalSkills.name: Rage Burst
normalSkills.desc:
Consumes 50 Rage and 5 Sand Crystals. Unleashes a mighty roar, dealing Attack Damage to nearby enemies, disrupting their actions, and granting an all-DMG-absorbing shield. (Shields may be stacked, with a maximum capacity equivalent to 100% of maximum HP) Reduces Attack Damage taken from the target by 10% for 12s.

Tips: Provides output capabilities when survival pressure is minimal and grants greater Attack Defense under conditions where enemy units predominantly inflict Attack Damage.

normalSkills.name: Brave Bastion
normalSkills.desc:
Forms a rock barrier around yourself that automatically counterattacks High-threat Skill for a set duration. Taunts nearby enemies and increases Block DMG RED. For each Sand Crystal consumed, the duration is extended by 1 second, up to a maximum extension of 5s.

Tips: Time it well. When facing high Attack Damage, promptly and significantly increase your Block DMG RED to mitigate incoming Attack Damage as much as possible.

normalSkills.name: Sandward
normalSkills.desc:
Erects an immovable rock wall and enter a defensive stance, taunting nearby monsters and becoming invincible. Blocking a High-threat Skill causes the wall to shatter and counterattack the target, dealing Attack Damage to all the enemies in front.

Tips: Ultimate tank skill, perfect for absorbing extreme DMG.

talentSkills.name: Halberd's Edge
talentSkills.desc:
Basic Attack: Halberd's Edge
A heavy four-strike combo with a wide-blade weapon, each strike dealing Attack Damage and generating Rage
Plunge Attack: Assault
Raise your blade high and dive from the air, slashing through enemies along your descent. Upon impact with the ground, deals Attack Damage.

talentSkills.name: Rage Burst
talentSkills.desc:
Consumes 50 Rage and 5 Sand Crystals to unleash a mighty roar, dealing Attack Damage to nearby enemies, disrupting their actions, and granting an all-DMG-absorbing Shield. (Shields may stack up to 50% Max HP) Reduces Attack Damage taken from the target by 10% for 12s.

Tips: Provides output capabilities when survival pressure is minimal and grants greater Attack Defense under conditions where enemy units predominantly inflict Attack Damage.

talentSkills.name: Stone Fist
talentSkills.desc: Enhanced <linktext=1539><style="ItemQuality_5">Granite Fury</style></linktext>, condenses the power of giant rocks, summoning a massive boulder to crash down from above the target, dealing <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">500%</style> Attack Power to the enemies within range, and is bound to deal critical damage. Scales with the Leve/Tier of <linktext=1539><style="ItemQuality_5">Granite Fury</style></linktext>.

talentSkills.name: Rage Burst
talentSkills.desc:
Consumes 50 Rage and 5 Sand Crystals. Unleashes a mighty roar, dealing Attack Damage to nearby enemies, disrupting their actions, and granting an all-DMG-absorbing shield. (Shields may be stacked, with a maximum capacity equivalent to 100% of maximum HP) Reduces Attack Damage taken from the target by 10% for 12s.

Tips: Provides output capabilities when survival pressure is minimal and grants greater Attack Defense under conditions where enemy units predominantly inflict Attack Damage.

normalAttackSkill.name: ​Bullseye​
normalAttackSkill.desc:
Initial max Photon Energy
is 100. Once full, performing a Special Attack will activate Photon Reforge state, consuming 25 Photon Energy per second. The state ends when Photon Energy reaches 0. During this state, certain skills gain enhanced effects.

Basic Attack: Surefire Shots
Quickly draw the bow to fire up to four consecutive arrows, each dealing Attack Damage. When not in Photon Reforgestate, the attack restores 2 Photon Energy.

Tips: Use Basic Attack to build up Photon Energy.

tags.name: Physical
tags.desc: Damage is physical, affected by Block

tags.name: Light
tags.desc: Skills imbued with the power of the Light

tags.name: Direct DMG
tags.desc: Damage generated by the skill move itself

tags.name: Single target
tags.desc: When there are fewer targets, the effect is stronger (if dealing damage, damage to the primary target does not diminish, but damage to other targets diminishes sharply)

tags.name: ENG Restore
tags.desc: Can obtain combat resources needed for certain skill releases

tags.name: Ranged
tags.desc: The skill remains effective even at a longer distance from the target

specialSkill.name: Storm Arrow
specialSkill.desc:
Quickly draws the bow to fire 5 arrows at the target, each dealing Attack Damage and generating 1 Photon Energy.
This skill has 2 Overdrives. When
Photon Energy reaches max, Storm Arrow instantly gains 2 Charges, and the max number of Overdrives increases to 5.

Tips: Even after five uses, Storm Arrow will continue to re-overdrive. Use other skills to buy time for more casts.

ultimateSkill.name: Luminary Bolt
ultimateSkill.desc:
Concentrates Photon Energy and fires a massive arrow toward enemies.
Upon impact with an enemy or reaching maximum range, the arrow explodes, dealing continuous Attack Damage to all enemies in the blast area, creating a gravity effect, and inflicting Vulnerability and Rooted.

Tips: An excellent crowd-control skill that can be decisive in multi-target engagements.

normalSkills.name: Torrent Volley
normalSkills.desc:
Continuously draws bow to launch a barrage of arrows at enemies, dealing Attack Damage. Can be activated again to terminate the ability early. While in
Photon Reforge state, Photon Energy consumption stops and hitting enemies recovers up to 42 Photon Energy.

Tips: Cast during Photon Reforge state to pause Photon Energy consumption and regenerate Photon Energy.

normalSkills.name: Arrow Rain
normalSkills.desc:
Fires a rain of arrows over a target area, dealing continuous Attack Damage. Grants 20 Photon Energy upon cast, plus 2 additional Photon Energy per enemy hit, up to 10 extra.

Tips: Hitting more enemies means gaining more Photon Energy.

normalSkills.name: Wildcall
normalSkills.desc:
Summon a powerful combat Companion to provide assistance in battle.

Summon Wild Wolf: The summoned Wild Wolf pounces on the current target, dealing Attack Damage to the target and nearby enemies, then joins the battle for 15s before disappearing.

Summon Falcon: The summoned Falcon dives in a straight line, dealing Attack Damage to all enemies in its path before disappearing.

Tips: Temporarily boosts the number of active battlefield Companions. Casting is recommended when all buffs are prepared to ensure maximum efficiency.

normalSkills.name: Powerdraw
normalSkills.desc:
Charge and then fire a piercing arrow that deals Attack Damage and Knockback to all enemies in its path. Reduce Resilience instead with targets with Resilience. Powerdraw deals a bonus 100% critical damage.
This skill has 2 Overdrives. No Overdrive time required when under
Photon Reforge.

Tips: Great for reducing enemies' Resilience while dealing area damage.

normalSkills.name: Radiance Barrage
normalSkills.desc:
Charges and fires Photon Arrows to a target area, dealing continuous Attack Damage.
In Photon Reforge state, Photon Energy stops to decline, and more arrows are generated, dealing 50% more Attack Damage.

Tips: Use in Photon Reforge state for bonus DMG and zero Photon Energy consumption.

normalSkills.name: ​Focus​
normalSkills.desc:
Enters Focus state, greatly increasing Haste and reducing the Cooldown of Special Attacks by 50%.

Tips: Best paired with Falconry Spec. Use it just before activating Photon Reforge for maximum uptime.

normalSkills.name: Blast Shot
normalSkills.desc:
Fire an Explosive Arrow at the target that detonates on impact. The Explosive Arrow detonates on impact, dealing Attack Damage to all nearby enemies. Each time when a
Class Skill deals Crit DMG, Explosive Arrow gains 1 Charge. At 5 Charges or after 6s, the Explosive Arrow explodes, each Charge increases the DMG of Explosive Arrow by 100%.

Tips: Better paired with Falconry Spec. Focus on Crit DMG to power up the explosion.

normalSkills.name: Deter Shot
normalSkills.desc:
Leap upward swiftly and fires at enemies, dealing Attack Damage. Grants immunity to Attack Damage for you and up to 10 nearby Allies for 5s.
This skill holds 2 charges.

Tips: This item is intended to be equipped in high-pressure situations to increase survivability.

normalAttackSkill.name: Blade of Justice
normalAttackSkill.desc:
Holy Sigil
Resource required to cast Special Attacks and some Expertise. There are 5 initial Holy Sigils. Each Holy Sigil enters a 10s CD after being consumed, and generates 10 Photon Energy.

Photon Energy
Resource required to cast some Expertise, starting at a max of 100.

Basic Attack: Blade of Justice
Unleashes a 3-hit sword combo followed by a Swing, each hit dealingAttack Damage.

specialSkill.name: Valor Bash
specialSkill.desc:
Consumes 1 Holy Sigil to deliver a powerful shield bash to enemies in front, dealing Attack Damage and increasing your Armor, stacking up to 3 times.

Tips: Monitor the Armor buff from Valor Bash and try to keep it active at all times.

ultimateSkill.name: Radiant Infusion
ultimateSkill.desc:
Unleashes holy energy to strike nearby enemies, dealing Attack Damage and inflicting Dazzled for 5s. Grants a Radiant Shield equal to 300% Attack Power. For the next 10s, instantly refreshes 1 Holy Seal for every 2s (prioritizing the Holy Seal with the longest remaining CD), and generates 10 Photon ERG each time.

Radiant Shield: Infuses the Shield with light, absorbing 50% of incoming DMG. The effect can stack absorption and reset duration when the Skill is reused. Max absorption cannot exceed 100% of Max HP.

Tips: Instantly boosts survivability and generates Holy Sigil and Photon Energy for flexible, well-timed casting.

normalSkills.name: Judgment
normalSkills.desc:
Consumes 45 Photon Energy to call down a blast of holy light on the target area, dealing Attack Damage and healing yourself based on HP lost (minimum heal: 5% of Max HP).

Tips: Cast when your HP is low—but not critically low—to maximize healing while staying safe.

Tips: Powerful offensive skill. Use when survivability is secure.

normalSkills.name: Shield Toss
normalSkills.desc:
Tosses the spinning shield, taunting nearby enemies, dealing Attack Damage, interrupting their actions, and reducing their DMG dealt by 10% for 10s.

Tips: Boosts survivability while unleashing wide-range DMG, ideal for handling multiple targets with strategic timing based on defense and battlefield needs.

normalSkills.name: ​Sacred Blade​
normalSkills.desc:
Consumes 3 Holy Sigils, summoning a sword from beneath the target's feet to deal Attack Damage and taunt the target, while gaining 5 layers of Lightforged Barrier.

Lightforged Barrier: Each layer increases the final Max HP by 2%. You can have up to 10 layers of Lightforged Barrier, and any damage taken will consume 1 layer. It lasts for 25s or until all layers are consumed, and the duration resets each time a layer is gained.

Tips: While having considerable damage capability, it can efficiently replenish Lightforged Barrier.

normalSkills.name: ​Radiance​
normalSkills.desc:
Unwavering resolve is gained, initiating the hurling of 5 shields toward the nearest enemy targets within a 10-meter radius, with priority given to those in closest proximity. Attack Damage is inflicted, and interruptions are applied to the targets. Subsequently, a single shield is thrown at 2s intervals, with 1 throw yielding 10 Photon Energy. In the next 10s, reduces each instance of DMG taken by a specified percentage of Max HP (up to a certain proportion of Attack Power), and any High-threat Skills encountered during this period are automatically counterattacked.

Tips: This skill does not consume Photon Energy or Holy Sigil to cast, and it provides strong survivability, making it ideal as an opening move.

normalSkills.name: ​Aegis Ward​
normalSkills.desc:
Summon Aegis Ward to shield yourself, automatically counterattacking High-threat Skills while increasing Armor and DMG Reduction. If you would suffer fatal DMG while active, this status is consumed to prevent death and immediately restore 25% HP.

Tips: Powerful DMG RED effect combined with death prevention, extremely valuable when facing intense survival pressure.

normalSkills.name: ​Zeal Crusade​
normalSkills.desc:
Consumes up to 8 stacks of Lightforged Barrier, summoning continuous radiant energy to spiral rapidly around you. Each second, it deals Attack Damage to nearby enemies and grants 1 stack of Lightforged Barrier.
Each time it deals DMG to 1 target, restores 1% max HP (up to 5%). When activated, each stack of Lightforged Barrier adds 2s to the duration, up to a maximum of 16s.

Lightforged Barrier: Max HP +2% with each stack. Lightforged Barrier stacks up to 10 times. Any incoming DMG consumes 1 stack. The effect lasts 25s or until all stacks are consumed. Duration resets each time a new stack is gained.

Tips: Use Lightforged Barrier to deal DMG and heal. Cast the skill when Lightforged Barrier is fully stacked to achieve excellent defense and burst potential.

normalSkills.name: Divine Circle
normalSkills.desc:
Creates a holy zone beneath your feet, healing yourself every second and healing allies in the area slightly, dealing Attack Damage to enemies.

Tips: Great for sustained DMG and healing. Try to cover as much area as possible.

talentSkills.name: Vanguard Strike
talentSkills.desc:
Consumes 1 Holy Sigil. After a brief charge, perform a fierce sweep forward, dealingAttack Damage and gaining 2 stacks of Lightforged Barrier.

Lightforged Barrier: Each stack increases max HP by 2%, up to 10 stacks. Taking any DMG consumes 1 stack. The Barrier lasts 25s or until all stacks are consumed. Gaining a new stack refreshes the duration.

Tips: Maintain high stacks of Lightforged Barrier while weaving in attacks. Pay attention to the use of Vanguard Hunt to trigger bonus effects.

Consumes Light Energy, spinning and throwing the shield, dealing Attack Damage to enemies it hits, and reducing all damage they deal to oneself for a period of time.

normalAttackSkill.name: String Strike
normalAttackSkill.desc:
Peaceful Tune
A magical melody that, whenever DMG is dealt, restores HP equal to 20% of the DMG dealt, distributed evenly among up to 5 allies (prioritizing Allies).
Allies at full HP will not be included in the healing targets. If all Allies are at full HP, the healing will be considered as excess healing.
Performance Energy: Energy required to play Melody skills (Heroic Melody and Healing Melody). 1 point is regenerated per second.
Performance Passion: Required to perform music. 1 point is regenerated every 5s.

Basic Attack: String Strike
Strikes the guitar's sideboard to produce a frenzied wave, dealing Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

Tips: Using Basic Attacks when Performance Passion and Performance Energy are not maxed out provides consistent healing. Pair with talents to store this healing for emergency use.

ultimateSkill.name: Rock the Stage
ultimateSkill.desc:
As a passionate music lover, your impromptu performance immediately grants 5 Performance Passion. It also heals nearby allies and gives them a Shield that decays over time, while dealing Magic Damage to nearby enemies. The Shield decays every 0.5s, lasting for 10s.
Performance Passion: Required to perform music. Regenerates1 stack every 5s.

Tips: In emergencies, this powerful shield can ease the team's survival pressure. Time the cast carefully to minimize shield decay.

normalSkills.name: Harmonic Anthem
normalSkills.desc:
Leap high and slam your guitar into the ground to burst sparks, dealing Magic Damage to the enemies within range.
Each instance of DMG dealt by Amplified Beat (only once per multi-target hit) increases the hit count of Harmonic Anthem by 1, up to 3.

Tips: Master the Amplified Beat's mechanic of increasing hit count to boost Harmonic Anthem's Attack.

normalSkills.name: Rhapsody of Flame
normalSkills.desc:
My Passion Still Burns! Consumes 5 points of Performance Passion to summon a randomly shaped graffiti on the ground, healing 10 allies (prioritizing Allies), dispelling negative effects on them, and dealing Magic Damageto enemies within range.
While standing within the graffiti, the summoner gains 10% Fire Bonus.

Performance Passion: Required to perform music. 1 point is regenerated every 5s.

Tips: This skill has the widest range for both healing and DMG. Cast it once the cooldown ends for max effectiveness.

normalSkills.name: Heroic Melody
normalSkills.desc:
A rousing melody. When Performance Energy exceeds 15 stacks, you can begin the performance, which cannot be stopped once started. CD: 5s.
While Heroic Melody is being performed, 6 Performance Energy is consumed per second, and every 3s, 10 allies (prioritizing Allies) restore HP every.
While Heroic Melody is being performed, every 7s, your String Strike transforms into Fierce Strike.
While Heroic Melody is being performed, the conversion rate of Peaceful Tune +50%.

Performance Energy: Required to play Melody skills (Heroic Melody and Healing Melody). 1 point of energy is regenerated per second.

Tips: The skill can't be stopped manually, so time its activation wisely to maximize synergy with Peaceful Tune and Fierce Strike.

normalSkills.name: Healing Melody
normalSkills.desc:
A soothing melody. When Performance Energy is above 15, you can start the performance freely and stop at will. Each time you start, a speaker is deployed to perform a Concerto (Speaker disappears when Healing Melody ends). CD: 5s.
While performing Healing Melody, consumes 3 Performance Energy per second, and heals 10 allies (Allies prioritized) every 1 second.
Speaker: When you cast Healing Beat, Fivefold Crescendo, Rock the Stage, Concert Circuit, the speaker will simultaneously cast the same skill.

Performance Energy: Required to play Melody skills (Heroic Melody, Healing Melody). Regenerates 1 point per second.

Tips: Mastering where and when to place the speaker is essential.

normalSkills.name: Fivefold Crescendo
normalSkills.desc:
Let the Passion Flow Again! Consumes 5 Performance Passion, reigniting the spirits of the weary. Performs a sequence of notes that heals 10 allies (Allies prioritized).

Performance Passion: Required to perform music. Regenerates1 stack every 5s.

Tips: Highest healing potential. Monitor team health to avoid overhealing.

normalSkills.name: Passion Burst
normalSkills.desc:
Strums the strings and releases searing flames forward, dealing Magic Damage to the enemies within range and dispelling negative effects for up to 10 allies (prioritizing Allies).
Charging changes the skill's range and DMG.
Tier 1: Chants for 0.7s, affects a fan-shaped area with an 8-meter radius in front.
Tier 2: Chants for 1.4s, affects a fan-shaped area with an 8-meter radius in front, increases the DMG dealt by 50%.
Tier 3: Chants for 2.1s, affects a fan-shaped area with an 8-meter radius in front, increases the DMG dealt by 100%.

Tips: Delivers massive DMG. When paired with Speaker and talents, it offers potent DMG and Healing. Be mindful of your surroundings during casting.

normalSkills.name: Encore
normalSkills.desc:
The perfect piece for fan interaction. Grants Encore effect to 10 allies (Allies prioritized) for 10s.
Encore: Super Armor. Each time an offensive or healing Expertise Skill is cast, there is a 50% fixed chance to trigger Encore Strings once, dealing DMG to the current target or healing the lowest-HP ally (Allies prioritized).

Tips: Cast during team burst windows for optimal DMG and Healing of Encore.

normalSkills.name: Center Stage
normalSkills.desc:
Increases your Magic Power for some time and amplifies the next skill you cast.

Special Attack: Your next 2 Special Attacks do not consume Performance Passion.
Fivefold Crescendo: Doubles the healing instances.
Heroic Melody: Halves the time needed to trigger Fierce Strike.
Harmonic Anthem: Doubles the DMG dealt.
Passion Burst: Allows for direct cast in its strongest form, no chanting required.

Tips: Evaluate the battle environment and your combat style, then apply the appropriate enhancement at the optimal moment.

talentSkills.name: Healing Beat
talentSkills.desc:
Consumes 3 Performance Passion to play a healing tune, healing yourself and the nearby ally with the lowest HP (Allies prioritized). Healing scales with Magic Power.

Performance Passion: Required to perform music. Regenerates1 stack every 5s.

Tips: High coverage healing skill. Use it before your Performance Passion overflows.

talentSkills.name: Fierce Strike
talentSkills.desc:
Swings your guitar with force, dealing Magic Damage equal to 300% Attack Power to nearby enemies. Harmonic Anthem instantly gains 1 stack of Overdrive. Scales with the Level/Tier of Basic Attack.

Tips: Use this skill when Harmonic Anthem is on cooldown.

talentSkills.name: Passion Burst
talentSkills.desc:
Channels for 6s and continuously spews searing flames forward, dealing Magic Damage equal to1000% Attack Power in total to the enemies within range.

Tips: Move continuously and try to maximize DMG dealt while staying safe.

tags.name: Direct DMG
tags.desc: Damage generated by the skill move itself

tags.name: AoE
tags.desc: Triggers a stronger effect when there are many targets (if it causes DMG, the DMG to all targets diminishes simultaneously)

tags.name: Expertise Skill
tags.desc: Skills and moves that can be freely combined and replaced with the weapon

tags.name: Magic
tags.desc: Damage is magic, not affected by Block

tags.name: Forest
tags.desc: Skills imbued with the power of the Forest

tags.name: Direct DMG
tags.desc: Damage generated by the skill move itself

tags.name: Single target
tags.desc: When there are fewer targets, the effect is stronger (if dealing damage, damage to the primary target does not diminish, but damage to other targets diminishes sharply)

tags.name: Channelling
tags.desc: A skill release method that requires maintaining a casting state to continue the effect

tags.name: Ranged
tags.desc: The skill remains effective even at a longer distance from the target

talentSkills.name: Infinite Rhapsody
talentSkills.desc:
Instantly releases a powerful sonic wave, dealing Magic Damage to nearby enemies. Heals nearby allies and grants a Shield that decays over time. The Shield decays every 0.5s, lasting for 10s. Doubles the Performance Passion cap and fully restores Performance Passion.

Performance Passion: Required to perform music. Regenerates1 stack every 5s.

Tips: A powerful emergency shield to ease team survival pressure. Time the cast to minimize shield decay. Once fully charged with Performance Passion, trigger burst.

talentSkills.name: Concert Circuit
talentSkills.desc:
A mobile performance melody. While performing, continuously heals allies. Deals Magic Damage to nearby enemies. Each healed ally increases healing by 6%, up to 30%. Each enemy hit increases DMG by 6%, up to 30%.

Tips: Sustained healing and DMG. Adjust your position based on the number and location of targets to maximize efficiency.
